level.heading: Fitness report.
level.text: The Department of Health shall provide data relating to physical activity, nutrition, and obesity and technical assistance to the Mayor's Council to assist it in publishing the annual fitness report required by ยง 7-122(a)(3).

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 19-58
level.text: For history of Law 19-58, see notes under ยง 7-121.
